title: Diamond Stream (Smurfing BRONZE TO CHALLENGER STREAM) ~ CHIZZELE
body: Come have a laugh, come enjoy, scare the crap out of me with a follow, who knows you just might like it ;)

replies.body:
Solid stream, good entertainment and value games.

followed

10/10 would watch agian.
So you leveled a smurf account to 30 and then intentionally threw your placements to start in bronze???

> [{quoted}](name=Seppy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RJ0A94YR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-04T23:14:24.426+0000)
>
> So you leveled a smurf account to 30 and then intentionally threw your placements to start in bronze???

I was given a bronze account with a terrible w/l ratio and MMR and then carried it up to here :)
